name: Multiple Iniitiatives Towards Upliftment
briefDescription: MITU's goals are to empower women through better health  and to promote use of cloth bags and other items made out of mainly  tailors' waste. Proceeds of these products are used to provide Menstrual Hygiene Management to underprivileged girls and women. The current focus on health is on providing education to overcome myths and taboos surrounding menstruation among school girls and women in villages.  Apart from educating them we  providing  low cost sanitary pads to girls in various institutions and schools in and around Bangalore. Constructing incinerators attached to girl's toilets in rural schools in Turuvakere, Tumkur Dist, Karnataka.
